PLT_CtrlPointInvokeActionTask Class Reference

The PLT_CtrlPointInvokeActionTask class is used by a PLT_CtrlPoint to invoke a specific action of a given service for a given device. More...

#include <PltCtrlPointTask.h>

Detailed Description

The PLT_CtrlPointInvokeActionTask class is used by a PLT_CtrlPoint to invoke a specific action of a given service for a given device.
